listitem.para: Unburies all procedures, variables, and property lists in the workspace. UNBURYALL abbreviates UNBURY CONTENTS.

listitem.programlisting: MAKE "foo [I am Foo] MAKE "bar [I am Bar] PONS Make "bar [I am Bar] Make "foo [I am Foo] BURYNAME [foo] PONS Make "bar [I am Bar] UNBURYALL PONS Make "bar [I am Bar] Make "foo [I am Foo]
